ivardefs.name: asserter
ivardefs.desc: The source of the information about the allergy that is recorded.

ivardefs.name: clinicalStatus
ivardefs.desc: The clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Code for an allergy or intolerance statement (either a positive or a negated/excluded statement).  This may be a code for a substance or pharmaceutical product that is considered to be responsible for the adverse reaction risk (e.g., "Latex"), an allergy

ivardefs.name: criticality
ivardefs.desc: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of the reaction to the identified substance.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The encounter when the allergy or intolerance was asserted.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this AllergyIntolerance by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

ivardefs.name: lastOccurrence
ivardefs.desc: Represents the date and/or time of the last known occurrence of a reaction event.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Additional narrative about the propensity for the Adverse Reaction, not captured in other fields.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The patient who has the allergy or intolerance.

ivardefs.name: reaction_
ivardefs.desc: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified substance.

ivardefs.name: recordedDate
ivardefs.desc: The recordedDate represents when this particular AllergyIntolerance record was created in the system, which is often a system-generated date.

ivardefs.name: recorder
ivardefs.desc: Individual who recorded the record and takes responsibility for its content.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.

ivardefs.name: verificationStatus
ivardefs.desc: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified substance (including pharmaceutical product).

properties.desc: Risk of harmful or undesirable, physiological response which is unique to an individual and associated with exposure to a substance.
